translations: v.揭露，发现；揭开盖子，移开覆盖物；发掘，挖出；脱帽（尤指表示敬意）

phrs.translation: 揭开, 揭露, 发现
冲破黑幕, 突破黑幕
被发现了, 发现, 侦破
底领外露, 底发中露

sentences.sentence: When the seedlings sprout, uncover the tray.
sentences.translation: 幼苗发芽后，揭开盘上的遮盖物。

sentences.sentence: The reason he had to uncover it was that beehive tombs, like everything else, were buried.
sentences.translation: 他必须揭开它的原因是这些蜂窝墓，像其他东西一样，被埋在地下。

sentences.sentence: The scientist is engaged in serious research to uncover the very nature of the physical world.
sentences.translation: 这位科学家正在进行认真的研究，以揭示物理世界的本质。
